title: Create an Infographic from Data
description: An agent must take a set of key project findings and design a simple infographic to communicate them visually.

tasks.description: Receive a list of 3-5 key data points (e.g., 'Reduced costs by 20%', 'Customer satisfaction up 15%').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly ingests the key findings.

tasks.description: For each data point, suggest a suitable icon or simple visual representation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent suggests appropriate icons (e.g., a downward arrow for cost reduction, a smiley face for satisfaction).

tasks.description: Arrange the data points and icons into a visually balanced layout description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a text-based description of a clean and simple infographic layout.
